thread.title: Neve Campbell joins House of Cards as new regular |
thread.title_full: Neve Campbell joins House of Cards as new regular | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Neve Campbell joins House of Cards as new regular |
text:
The Scream star has joined the cast of Netflix drama House of Cards as a new season regular, Deadline reports. New kid on the block ... Neve Campbell is joining the cast of House of Cards. Picture: Servando Gomez Camarillo/LatinContent/Getty Images Source: Getty Images
The actress’ character remains under wraps, but critics speculate that Season 4 will introduce a new, younger couple to rival Francis (Kevin Spacey) and Claire (Robin Wright) Underwood.
Power couple ... Neve Campbell will star alongside Kevin Spacey and Robin Wright in the White House drama. Picture: Nathaniel Bell Source: Supplied
The role is a big coup for Campbell, who shot to fame playing Julia Salinger in 1990s TV series Party of Five , before landing big screen parts in Wild Things and Panic .
The 41-year-old is also doing an arc on the second season of NBC comedy Welcome To Sweden .
1990s TV show ... Neve Campbell shot to fame on Party of Five. Picture: Handout Source: News Corp Australia
Season 3 of House of Cards ended on a cliffhanger (SPOILER) with Claire walking out on her power-hungry husband as he campaigns for another presidential term.
The next instalment, slated for a 2016 release, will begin filming in Baltimore, Maryland over the US summer.
Originally published as ‘90s TV star joining House of Cards
